get.summary: Get all profiles that are used by the given project.

parameters.description: OntoMe profile that should be added

parameters.description: Language ISO Code for the preferred language of labels and descriptions to be loaded. Default language is 'en'.

parameters.description: OntoMe profile that should be added

parameters.name: requestedLanguage
parameters.description: Language ISO Code for the preferred language of labels and descriptions to be loaded. Default language is 'en'.

parameters.description: Geovistory project for which the activation report should be created

parameters.name: requestedLanguage
parameters.description: Language ISO Code for the preferred language of labels and descriptions to be loaded. Default language is 'en'.

get.summary: Get a flat object of temporal entities.

parameters.name: pkSourceEntity
parameters.description: Pk of the source entity to which the temporal entities are related.

parameters.name: pkProperty
parameters.description: Pk of the property leading from source entity to the temporal entities.

parameters.name: pkTargetClass
parameters.description: Fk class of the target temporal entities.

parameters.name: isOutgoing
parameters.description: If true, the source entity is domain, else range.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset of the segment of returned temporal entities.

get.summary: Get a flat object of entity previews, that are target of a list.

parameters.name: pkSourceEntity
parameters.description: Pk of the source entity to which the entity previews, that are target of a list are related.

parameters.name: pkProperty
parameters.description: Pk of the property leading from source entity to the entity previews, that are target of a list.

parameters.name: pkTargetClass
parameters.description: Fk class of the target entity previews, that are target of a list.

parameters.name: isOutgoing
parameters.description: If true, the source entity is domain, else range.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of returned entity previews, that are target of a list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset of the segment of returned entity previews, that are target of a list.
